pages.title: 哎呀，我们遇到了一些问题
pages.text: 哎呀，我们遇到了一些问题 Error: 404 页面不存在 可能是输入地址有误或该地址已被删除

posts.title: Hello 3.0
posts.text: 嘿，别来无恙！ Let’s Hello 3.0 this time. 12345public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello 3.0"); }} 1234567#include <iostream>using namespace std;int main(){ cout << "Hello 3.0" << endl; return 0;} 123456#include <stdio.h>int main(){ printf("Hello 3.0\n"); return 0;} 1print("Hello 3.0") 1document.write("<h1>Hello 3.0</h1>"); 12345678<!DOCTYPE html><html> <body> <?php echo "Hello 3.0"; ?> </body></html> Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you did not do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover. ——Mark Twain 当你老了以后，你绝对会因为当时没有去码头整点薯条而后悔。
